text: I still remember how I came about this game. A few years ago I was just searching online for some new video game music. I stumbled upon an unknown website and also found out about Y's music too, actually. Boss Battle was the first track I ever heard from SMT:N, and I just loved it. From that day forward I was totally into Meguro's work and how I've grown to love all SMT titles.

text: I think Persona 4 was more of a grindfest. WIth Persona 3:FES, I kinda found a strategy and was able to succeed with it. In P4, the main thing that through me off was that you had to pay a HUGE amount of money to heal when in dungeons, limiting how much you could level up per day.

text: Smt games are the absolute best. They delve into subjects no other form of literature (movie game or book) will touch and the music and story are unparalelled.
